title: Roots 2: Reparations
description: A followup to the classic miniseries. This time around, white slave owners are going to pay. Quinton “Rampage” Jackson is Kunta Kinte 9000.
quote: My name is Kunta Kinte 9000! And you can Kunta kiss my ass!
altHero: Quinton Jackson as Kunta Kinte 9000 wearing a K chain and holding a machine gun
alt1: Kunta Kinte 9000 shooting his gun as slaves board a jet behind him
alt2: Kunta Kinte 9000 punching Michael Cera in the gut
alt3: a missile flies at the White House
